item.title: Where to place statement?
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

Lol, USE YOUR BRAINS, but w.e…Just search for somthing like “you cannot teleport” than add there for like
if (isinwilderness && wildernesslevel >20){
sendmessage (“you can only teleport out of wilderness when you are under 20 wilderness”);
}

i hope you get it, just somthing like that, just search for a triggertele teleport than place it there. should bee easy, i made this in 2 minutes and 16 seconds phew…

Aintaro

item.title: Where to place statement?
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

I am creating a tutorial island for my server, so I implemented a simple “quest int” to help with their progress.

I am having trouble finding out where to place this:

if (q2 < 5) { teleblock = true; }

Its simply because if a player is less than 5 on q2 then they cannot leave the island (teleport). I just have no idea where to place this statement.

-Rich Dude

Read full topic
